question_text: A display repeatedly shows severe flickering and horizontal bars. Replacing the cable and monitor had no effect. Whatâ€™s the most appropriate next step?
answer_options: Install a firmware update for the BIOS
Disable hardware acceleration in the OS
Use VGA mode to reset the screen size
correct_answer: Disable hardware acceleration in the OS
explanation: Some graphics cards experience compatibility issues with hardware acceleration. Disabling it can resolve severe flickering artifacts.
